entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Oshawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:52 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 05:52 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.3°C
Wind: N 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this morning then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 40%
